wikipedia_page.main: Steven Harris is a British cartoonist and writer, based in London. His first novel, 'Eustace', was published in March 2013 by Jonathan Cape and launched at Waterstones Gower Street.

response: *Steven Harris (wide receiver) (born 1981), American football wide receiver
*Steven Harris (defensive tackle) (born 1984), American football defensive tackle for the Denver Broncos
*Steven Harris (Law & Order: Special Victims Unit), a character from the TV series Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
